author: dwright
title: Liverpool 2 Swansea 3: Jurgen Klopp can forget winning Premier League, Philippe Coutinho is struggling and Swans still need to improve
text:
EFL kop flop Liverpool 2 Swansea 3: Jurgen Klopp can forget winning Premier League, Philippe Coutinho is struggling and Swans still need to improve 
Five things we learnt as Reds crashed to defeat to bottom club that all but ends their hopes of being crowned champions By DUNCAN WRIGHT
